function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of collaboration between building practitioners, health professionals, and data scientists in enhancing the design of healthy buildings.","Impact":"Ineffective healthy building design and potential health risks for occupants.","Mitigation":"Establish networking and collaboration opportunities between the different disciplines and streamline common definitions, metrics, and measurement schemes for health in building contexts.","Technologies":"Networking platforms, collaborative software, data analysis tools.","People":"Building practitioners, health professionals, data scientists.","Owner":"Building design organizations, health organizations, data science organizations."},{"Description":"Lack of establishment of building design guidelines as a standard for the design of healthy buildings.","Impact":"Inconsistent and suboptimal healthy building designs leading to potential health hazards for occupants.","Mitigation":"Set up standardized building design guidelines for healthy buildings and adoption of industry standards such as WELL and FitWel.","Technologies":"Building design software, industry standard compliance tools.","People":"Building practitioners, health professionals, data scientists.","Owner":"Building design organizations, health organizations, regulatory bodies."},{"Description":"Lack of professional certification for healthy building design among design professionals.","Impact":"Potential lack of expertise in healthy building design and subpar design outcomes.","Mitigation":"Encourage and facilitate the acquisition of professional certification for healthy building design among design professionals.","Technologies":"E-learning platforms, certification management systems.","People":"Design professionals, regulatory bodies, certification organizations.","Owner":"Design professional associations, certification organizations."}]}
